title: Personal Firearm Defense - Extreme Close Quarters Shooting
description:
========== DESCRIPTION ==========
American Rifleman Video Collection Presents the Personal Firearm Defense DVD Series, a collection of self-defense firearm instructional videos for civilians.

This DVD (Extreme Close Quarters Shooting) includes the following segments:

- Extreme Close Quarters Shooting
- The Body's Natural Reactions (Bonus)

I will upload more videos from this series as I am able to get my hands on copies of the physical DVD's.
